name: Ibis Nice Centre Gare

reviews.text: Stayed 3 nights during September. Have selected their offer to pay in advance with big discount. The room is quite good for one person. For two person will just be Okay. I have enjoyed the room with their newTV where one can watch BBC news which was good for me.
reviews.title: Value for money

likes.liked: — convenient location and value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only thing did not like is hearing the bathroom from other room.
reviews.title: Ecellent value good base
Typical Ibis, perhaps nicer
reviews.text: May be due to thin wall. With the price paid ,can not complain especially since the sound is only for few minutes. Next to train station which make it convenient for travel. It is good hotel since i was on my own but probably it would not be comfortable if with the family especially the kids since they have been used to 4 to 5 star hotel when we travel. Such as Hayyat hotel in Berlin and in Mainze in Germany and in Dubai. When on my own I do not mind any hotel as long as it is safe , quite and comfortable bed to sleep and with bathroom. The Ibis fullfil these requirements.

I stayed here 07.07.07 to 10.07.07 for a long week end with my partner and another couple. The hotel was an excellent base for us as we wanted to go to Monaco by train , the hotel is next door top the station, and walking distance from the promanade and the old town.
reviews.title: A good night's sleep but nothing pleasant

aka: Ibis Nice Centre Gare Hotel Nice
description: The Ibis Nice Centre Gare hotel is next to the railway station, and 5 km from the airport. The hotel has 199 air-conditioned rooms, with Wifi Internet access, including 7 adapted for disabled persons. The CAFE SUD&CIE restaurant, a terrace, a swimming pool, a bar, a snack service 24/24, pay parking and 5 seminar rooms are at your disposal. The old city of Nice and its castle, the Musée d'Art Moderne, the opera house and the national theatre of Nice are only 2 km away.
